archimate:SystemSoftware.name: SSI Stack
archimate:SystemSoftware.documentation: A generic version of the Sovrin Stack in which the bottom layerâ€”the Sovrin Ledger layerâ€”is expanded to include any distributed ledger, blockchain, or other SSI Network capable of supporting the three higher layersâ€”the Agent-to-Agent Protocol layer, the Credential Exchange layer, and the Governance Framework layer.
